conflictDetection.description: Conflict Detection strategy to use. Valid values are `NONE` and `VERSION`.

conflictHandler.description: Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict. Valid values are `NONE`, `OPTIMISTIC_CONCURRENCY`, `AUTOMERGE`, and `LAMBDA`.

lambdaConflictHandlerConfig.description: Lambda Conflict Handler Config when configuring `LAMBDA` as the Conflict Handler. See Lambda Conflict Handler Config.
